comment: From aliphatic amino acid:CYP83A1 (see R08666) From aromatic amino acid:CYP83B1 (see R08168, R08653 and R10671) two-step reaction (see R08607+R08608)
definition: Aldoxime + NADPH + Oxygen + L-Cysteine + H+ <=> S-Alkyl-thiohydroximate + NADP+ + 2 H2O
name: aldoxime,NADPH:oxygen oxidoreductase (adding cysteine)
